definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]

sentences.english: Right-click the project, and launch the properties dialog.
sentences.chinese: 右键单击工程，启动属性对话框。

sentences.english: Typically, that involves retrying for a certain amount of time and then displaying a dialog.
sentences.chinese: 通常，这涉及重试一段时间然后显示对话框。

sentences.english: DWL_MSGRESULT Sets the return value of a message processed in the dialog box procedure.
sentences.chinese: 用于对话框窗口，设置消息处理函数的返回值。

sentences.english: Typing a password into the dialog will send it to the terminal.
sentences.chinese: 在对话框中输入的密码将发送到终端。

sentences.english: A dialog box displaying overridable members appears.
sentences.chinese: 即会出现显示可重写成员的对话框。

sentences.english: Because these users are fictitious, close this dialog window.
sentences.chinese: 因为这些用户是虚构的，所以关闭该对话框。

sentences.english: The default page footer for new documents that can be modified using the page setup dialog.
sentences.chinese: 新默认页面的地脚可以用页面设置对话框更改。

sentences.english: You should see Operation completed successfully in a pop-up dialog:.
sentences.chinese: 您将在弹出对话框中看到操作成功完成。

sentences.english: How to fire an event when a DialogBox got hided in GWT?
sentences.chinese: 如何火灾事件，当一个对话框就隐藏在GWT？

sentences.english: This dialog box lets you set up the class information.
sentences.chinese: 在这个对话框中可以设置类信息。

sentences.english: The License Info dialog now displays license names up to 60 characters.
sentences.chinese: 的许可证信息对话框现在显示牌名称最多60个字符。

sentences.english: Display a built-in dialog box for locating files.
sentences.chinese: 显示用于查找文件的内置对话框。

sentences.english: You can use creation dialogs to submit new change requests.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用创建对话框，来提交一些新的变更请求。

sentences.english: Notice that locked properties do not appear in the deployment time dialog.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，锁定的属性不会在部署时对话框中出现。

sentences.english: The default page header for new documents that can be modified using the page setup dialog.
sentences.chinese: 新文档的默认页眉，可以使用页面设置对话框修改。

definition: to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
